titles.title: A resolution to amend the Standing Rules of the Senate to require a supermajority for Senate approval of the bills or amendments containing unfunded Federal mandates.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S14542)
Referred to the Committee on Rules.

bill.summary: 10/27/1993--Introduced. Amends the Standing Rules of the Senate to make it out of order in the Senate to consider any bill, joint resolution, conference report, amendment, or motion that contains one or more unfunded Federal mandates, unless the provisions containing such mandates are considered individually or en bloc, at the discretion of the Majority Leader or his designee. Requires a two-thirds vote of approval by the Senators for the provisions to remain part of the bill and to waive a point of order made against the measure.
